languages.text: Окорок алцедонта одолел вас — вы так переполнены, что хватит любого неосторожного движения, чтобы еда начала проситься наружу.
The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.
languages.original_text: Окорок алцедонта одолел вас — вы так переполнены, что хватит любого неосторожного движения, чтобы еда начала проситься наружу.

traits.locale_text: The leg of alcedont has had the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement would put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.
The leg of alcedont has had the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement would put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.
The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.
The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.
The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.
The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

languages.text: アルセドントの脚肉にすっかりやられてしまった。満腹すぎて、うっかり動こうものなら、食べたものが逆流してきそうな勢いだ。
languages.original_text: The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

traits.locale_text: アルセドントの脚肉にすっかりやられてしまった。満腹すぎて、うっかり動こうものなら、食べたものが逆流してきそうな勢いだ。

languages.text: Alsedont paçası midene oturdu. Midene giren bu yemeklerin bir de çıkışı olacağı, en ufak hareketinde aklına geliyor.
languages.original_text: The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

traits.locale_text: Alsedont paçası midene oturdu. Midene giren bu yemeklerin bir de çıkışı olacağı en ufak hareketinde aklına geliyor.

languages.text: La pierna de alcedonte te ha derrotado. Estás tan llen{mf|o|a} que cualquier movimiento repentino puede hacer que la comida intente salir por donde ha entrado.
languages.original_text: The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

traits.locale_text: La pierna de alcedonte te ha derrotado. Estás tan llen{mf|o|a} que cualquier movimiento repentino puede hacer que la comida intente salir por donde ha entrado.

languages.text: 你沦为了角兽腿肉的手下败将。你吃得实在是太撑了，哪怕仅仅做个不经意的动作，也可能会让吃下去的东西全都涌上来。
languages.original_text: The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

traits.locale_text: 你沦为了角兽腿肉的手下败将。你吃得实在是太撑了，哪怕仅仅做个不经意的动作，也可能会让吃下去的东西全都涌上来。

languages.text: Le cuissot d'alcedont s'avère particulièrement indigeste. Vous avez l'estomac si lourd que vous craignez de régurgiter votre repas au moindre mouvement.
languages.original_text: The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

traits.locale_text: Le cuissot d'alcedont s'avère particulièrement indigeste. Vous avez l'estomac si lourd que vous craignez de régurgiter votre repas au moindre mouvement.

languages.text: Du hast im Bein eines Alcedont deinen Meister gefunden. Du bist derart satt, dass jede unbesonnene Bewegung dazu führen könnte, dass dir das Essen wieder hochkommt.
languages.original_text: The leg of alcedont has gotten the better of you. You are so full that any careless movement will put you at risk of the meal fighting its way back out.

traits.locale_text: Du hast im Bein eines Alcedont deinen Meister gefunden. Du bist derart satt, dass jede unbesonnene Bewegung dazu führen könnte, dass dir das Essen wieder hochkommt.
